name: Breadcrumb
description: Horizontal breadcrumb trail with arrow/slash separators and overflow handling.

use: you need a path indicator for hierarchical navigation.
avoid: users don’t need to navigate back to parent levels.

examples.minimal:
Breadcrumb(
  children: const [
    Text('Home'),
    Text('Library'),
    Text('Data'),
  ],
)

accessibility: Ensure each segment has a clear label.
dont: Use breadcrumbs as the only navigation on mobile.
